title: Clarifies that guide dogs, hearing dogs, and service dogs are allowed in public places during their training and socialization process
summary: Clarifies that guide dogs, hearing dogs, and service dogs are allowed in public places during their training and socialization process; provides that such dog must wear an identifying item stating that it is in training, and that the trainer must have paperwork available for inspection that such dog is being trained or socialized.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to the training and socialization of guide dogs
